title: Nisqually Health Services
description: The Nisqually Tribe operates a clinic as part of the federal Indian Health Service, currently the only universal public health care program in the United States.
cleaned_text: The Nisqually Tribe operates a clinic as part of the federal Indian Health Service, currently the only universal public health care program in the United States. The Indian Health Service is an agency within the federal Department of Health and Human Services and is the principal healthcare provider and advocate for native peoples. The IHS provides a comprehensive health service delivery system for approximately 1.9 million American Indians and Alaska Natives who belong to 562 federally recognized tribes in 35 states. The Nisqually clinic offers limited primary care medical services and also employs a full-time dentist through its health clinic. The tribe bills Medicaid and Medicare for services provided to Medicaid- and Medicare-eligible patients, and private insurance for those patients with private coverage. The Nisqually Tribal Health & Wellness Center: Nisqually Tribal Health & Wellness Center is an ambulatory care facility. We offer outpatient, family practice medical care, along with dental, behavioral health, pharmacy, and traditional healing services. We offer a wide range of traditional and Western medical care in our facility. From preventative medical care and state-of-the-art dental procedures to our new hyperbaric chamber and traditional medicine apothecary. Our Vision: Resting on a foundation of Nisqually cultural strength, the Nisqually Tribal Health and Wellness Center envisions a healthy and healing community, supported across the life cycle, providing for the emotional, physical, social, and spiritual health and wellness of the whole community Our Mission: We develop and provide our community with comprehensive services in a respectful and caring atmosphere that results in self-sufficiency and an improved quality of life for this and future generations Nisqually Tribal Health & Wellness Center 4840 Journey Street SE Olympia WA 98513 Phone: (360) 459-5312 Reminder: always dial 911 for serious or life-threatening emergencies.
